item.title: [TUT] The Ultimate Aryan Newbie Guide
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

You have to move the scipt (the .java file, and the .class file) into the scripts folder of aryan, then when you start aryan again, they’ll appear in the black box, and you’ll be able to run them.

Read full topic
